Yggdrasil: Before we do this, there is something I want to suggest.
However, you might not like it.

He straightened himself up and turned a holoprojector on.

Yggdrasil: We have part of Nightlight's spark. What I suggest we do is
that we create a clone and replace the real Nightlight by the clone.
We could also boobytrap the clone so as to make it a direct threat
that would be right under the nose of the preds.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus, along with Elita, follows Yggdrasil to the other room.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: So should we get these protective programs uploaded
to my spark now?
